original_text: “Woe to you, teachers of the law and Pharisees, you hypocrites! You clean the outside of the cup and dish, but inside they are full of greed and self-indulgence.
korean_text: 화 있을진저 외식하는 서기관들과 바리새인들이여 잔과 대접의 겉은 깨끗이 하되 그 안에는 탐욕과 방탕으로 가득하게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: teachers of the law and Pharisees
You clean the outside of the cup and dish
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 잔과 대접의 겉만 깨끗이 하니

sentences.original_text: but inside they are full of greed
